channel.title: Requesting Java Coders
channel.description:
Hey guys I am going to attempt to make a MMORPG with java, but I do not know how to code a base From Java. i would need somebody to put the main files. and add sprites and like 4-5 weaposn and 2 types of armors.
Here is what the requirements of the base must be: -Made From Java and not recreated from a rsps source. -Have a chat that looks nothing like rs or rsps. -have an inventory. -Have 3 major major things above the inventory: HP, EXP, COMBATLEVEL -Have atleast 4 NPCs coded. -And lastly, have a home, a shop, and a forest for monsters.
I will give credit to whoever helps.
Also, I am going to need a GFX designer for like the banner.
Thanks, XtremeOrigins Staff (only me atm)

item.title: Requesting Java Coders
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

gamedev.moparisthebest.com

Create a team and put effort into it, don’t just ask people to code for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Java Coders
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

It’s always good to have the will, but it’d be wrong of us to delude you with the illusion of success, when there’s probably a 99% chance that… that will… won’t last.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Java Coders
item.dc:creator: @XtremeOrigins XtremeOrigins
item.description:
@XtremeOrigins wrote:

It’s okay guys, and i named it XtremeOrigins because i was going to base it off of Eclipse Origins. But now im going to make it from java. I have guides.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Java Coders
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Those few simple requests would take months, and yeah, no one will do this for free. I think you are under estimating this a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Java Coders
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

[quote=“XtremeOrigins, post:1, topic:423292”]Hey guys I am going to attempt to make a MMORPG with java, but I do not know how to code a base From Java. i would need somebody to put the main files. and add sprites and like 4-5 weaposn and 2 types of armors.

Here is what the requirements of the base must be:
-Made From Java and not recreated from a rsps source.
-Have a chat that looks nothing like rs or rsps.
-have an inventory.
-Have 3 major major things above the inventory: HP, EXP, COMBATLEVEL
-Have atleast 4 NPCs coded.
-And lastly, have a home, a shop, and a forest for monsters.

I will give credit to whoever helps.

Also, I am going to need a GFX designer for like the banner.

Thanks,
XtremeOrigins Staff (only me atm)[/quote]
No one will do this unless they will be paid. But I still think this is a big task and people won’t want to do it.

Read full topic
